EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Response - Mar09 Data Directory Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: IntApp Data Directory Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}:
Thank you for registering for the Data Directory webinar. Date: Friday, March 6 Time: 9 am Pacific / 12 pm Eastern
Video:
Conference URL: http://e-meetings.mci.com/nc/join.php?i=SV56561&p=intapp&t=c Conference/Meeting Number: SV56561 Conference/Meeting Passcode: IntApp
Audio:
Conference Audio Dial In: US/Canada: 800-369-1859 UK: 1-630-395-0048 (give operator the passcode: "IntApp" and conference leader's name: "John Hall")
Please log in and dial the conference audio line 10 minutes prior to the start time.
